metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14850 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability was discovered in nbdkit 1.12.7, 1.14.1and 1.15.1. An attacker could connect to the nbdkit service and cause it toperform a large amount of work in initializing backend plugins, by simplyopening a connection to the service. This vulnerability could causeresource consumption and degradation of service in nbdkit, depending on theplugins configured on the server-side.

criterions.comment: nbdkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
